descriptions.mainTitle: A simple title component with a main title and optional caption.
descriptions.services: Displays service offerings with icons, titles, and descriptions.
descriptions.staticContent: Displays static content with title and text.
descriptions.statistics: Shows numerical statistics with icons and descriptions.
descriptions.subPages: Navigation for sub-pages within the site.
descriptions.about: About section with text and image.
descriptions.animatedCard: Cards with animation effects for featuring content.
descriptions.features: Highlights key features of products or services.
descriptions.highlightedSection: Section with special styling to highlight important content.
descriptions.staff: Shows team members with their information and photos.
descriptions.footer: Page footer with contact information and links.
descriptions.hero: Hero banner or slider for the main page header.
descriptions.news: Displays news articles with images and excerpts.

Sections.previewNotImplemented: This section requires complex data structures and is not implemented in the preview.
Sections.clickToView: Click on a section name to view its documentation and preview
